author: toon10001
title: Breezin' by
review:
Breez has 55 pieces, and is in a bag. To the review!

 

Parts

 

Bone/limbs/torso

 

2 pinhole black open X2, 2 one pinhole white open X2, one pinhole red closed X2, no pinhole closed black X2 and a standard wide sholdered torso black

 

Armour/Armour add ons

 

lime green:

size 5 X2, size 3 X1, wide style X2,printed green chestplate and 2 ball shoulder armour plates

 

White:

size 5 X2

 

Other add ons

2 cone system pieces

2 megaphone/stormtrooper gun system pieces

2 rocket base pieces system

 

Weapons

 

silver and red sword pieces X2

Frezno effect trans red shield pieces X2

Thornrax launcher piece short red X1

Gun style piece red X1

 

Other

 

3 black connecters

3 black pins (one spare)

4 red axels short

2 exo force arm pieces light grey (one spare)

3 bionicle chain pieces gunmetal

2 Hero Cuffs head gunmetal

1 trans red glatorian head piece

1 Breez 1.0 mask

3 Breez 1.0 feet

2 Lime green hands

1 hero core (with code)  

 

Playability

 

Can pose in any way she wants and more. You can get her to fight thornraxx in the hive planet.

 

Overall

 

Breez looks good and can do anything she wants. the shield looks epic and she can launch her gun. and she can cuff poor thornraxx and take him back.

 

If you live in the UK, get her, US try ebay.

 

Bye

author: StevenTheBrick
title: BREEZ
review:
3/5

Building Expierence would be quick.

Parts are unique, but could break over time.

Playability is ok from Bionicle and Hero Factory sets.

Value at $13 is ok compared to other brick built characters.
